PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-06452013-06-06HC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActControlled Drugs and Substances Act
SubjectMarihuana for Medical Purposes Regulations
PrecisMARIHUANA FOR MEDICAL PURPOSES REGULATIONS in order to (1) treat dried marihuana as much as possible like a medication by creating a licensing scheme for the commercial production and distribution of dried marihuana for medical purposes; (2) modify the New Classes of Practitioner Regulations, the Narcotic Control Regulations and eventually repeal the Marihuana Medical Access Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0119 Publication Date: 2013-06-19
AttachmentsAttachment
